Html:
Hi, i'm french coder and i'm porting the famous Mod Player MikMod to C#.

Here, a video of the actual state of the player : http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=FWdcc4RgvXg

I Wonder if you're interresting to work with me.

Have fun.

Hi there,

the video is impressive. Very cool. Sadly I have very little time at the moment for embarking on new development projects as I already have several commitments, but please keep me updated with your progress, and feel free to ask any questions here.

Mark

Hi, I've released my player on codeplex. The Windows version use Naudio 1.3 (I plan to test with 1.4 RC)

http://sharpmod.codeplex.com/
awesome, looking forward to giving this a try
